padlock.name: Padlock
padlock.description:
Padlocks prevent you from being robbed.
Padlocks automatically break after 1 month.

invisibilityPotion.name: Invisibility Potion
invisibilityPotion.description:
Invisibility potions drastically increases your chance of robbing someone.
Invisibility potions automatically wear off after a day.

lockpick.name: Lockpick (Coming Soon)
lockpick.description:
Lockpicks have a chance of breaking a users padlock.
Lockpicks can only be used once.
